coup

Class ExchangeAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • coup.Action
      • coup.ExchangeAction

  • public class ExchangeAction
extends Action
    Facilitates the exchange of 2 specific cards with the Court Deck. As this action does not affect coins and influence, it requires a unique implementation.
